title: Karcher FC 5 Electric Hard Floor Cleaner â€“ For Laminate, Wood, Tile, LVT, Vinyl, & Stone Flooring
features: Outstanding Performance: The FC 5's innovative drive concept features forward rotating rollers that propell the device across the floor at 500 RPM, giving you effortless cleaning on all hard floors

The Karcher Promise - Cleaner. Quicker: This multi-surface floor cleaner directly picks up dirt, small debris, and hair, all while mopping your floors. Cleaned floors dry within 2 minutes due to the minimal amount of cleaning solution being used
Dual Tank System: Fresh water and detergent is applied to the rollers of the FC 5 from one tank, while dirty water and light debris is suctioned away from the rollers into a separate dirty water tank

Edge to Edge Cleaning: The FC 5 effortlessly cleans right up to the edges of walls, stairs, corners, and baseboards. A flexible hinge on the cleaning head allows the device to clean under furniture and around small objects

Easy Device Cleaning: Comes equipped with an integrated self-cleaning function in the included clean and park station. It's wastewater tank can be emptied without coming into contact with the dirt, and a floor head cover can be removed and washed quickly under running water
Karcher Warranty: Backed by a 3-year limited warranty and industry-leading rapid exchange program, Karcher products offer high-powered performance and unparalleled ease of use
description: The Karcher FC5 Improved Hard Floor Cleaner with its lightweight body is the simplest solution to deep cleaning your hard floors. Settling for floor cleaners that barely mop the surface of your floor is the past, welcome yourself into the future of cleaning. Features microfiber rollers that make constant direct contact with your floors, giving it a deep clean and brilliant shine. Features microfiber rollers that make constant direct contact with your floors, giving it a deep clean and brilliant shine. Clean water is constantly applied to the front of the rollers while dirt and light debris is removed into a separate waste water tank, leaving your floors dry in just two minutes with the dual water tank feature. Perfect edge cleaning allows you to easily clean right up against baseboards or cabinets. The sweeper vacuum with its unique design allows for perfect edge cleaning right up against baseboards and cabinets, while the swivel head and low profile make it easy to maneuver under and around furniture.
